Review.Titre: Extremely Disappointing Experience
Review.Contenu: Extremely Disappointing ExperienceRating: ★☆☆☆☆I recently hired Web Design Marvel for a website project, and the entire experience was far from what I had expected. Here's why I cannot recommend their services:1. **Lack of Communication**: Throughout the project, there was a severe lack of communication. They rarely responded to my emails or calls, and when they did, it felt like I was bothering them.2. **Missed Deadlines**: The project was delayed multiple times, and it took much longer than originally agreed upon. This not only caused inconvenience but also led to lost opportunities for my business.3. **Poor Quality**: The quality of the work they delivered was subpar. I had to point out numerous issues and inconsistencies, and even after multiple revisions, I was not satisfied with the final result.4. **Unprofessionalism**: I was taken aback by the unprofessional behavior of their team. They didn't seem to value my business and treated my project as an afterthought.5. **Overcharging**: To make matters worse, the final invoice was higher than the initial estimate. They charged for additional work that was not clearly discussed or agreed upon.In conclusion, my experience with Web Design Marvel was nothing short of frustrating and disappointing. I strongly advise potential clients to thoroughly research and consider other options before choosing their services. Your time, money, and project deserve better treatment and professionalism.

Review.Titre: DO NOT TRUST THIS COMPANY!
Review.Contenu: DO NOT TRUST THIS COMPANY!I have paid $1100 USD and they promised to design and build my website in 2 weeks. Its been 5 weeks now and yet to see anything from them. I had to dispute the charge with my credit card company to get my money back despite the fact that they promise 100% satisfaction guaranty. Its all fake and misrepresentation be very careful.

Review.Titre: Project Managers are Important
Review.Contenu: After changing my Developers from in-house to Web Design Marvel, my account representatives Mark Dennis and Sean Johnson were instrumental in identifying the sites' needs. Developers sometimes are too focused on their job to understand the full scope of the client's actual needs. Mark and Sean understood this and made sure the (out-of-scope) components were handled. It is essential that your project managers understand that clients cannot think of everything and make recommendations before starting a project, which can be costly if they do not. One of the better aspects of our working relationship is that our SEO conversions have doubled, and the cost of Google AdWords has decreased with their services.Since our first site together, I have sent many others to Web Design Marvel. I no longer need a developer in-house; the monthly maintenance has allowed me to reduce my labor costs.Recently I had them refresh the same website with a different layout, and from the first view, it was overwhelming. The site was designed with all the latest codes and small features such as mouse hovering and interactivity will the layout and colors were eye-catching.
